ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) triangleNo = function(num) return (num * (num+1)) / 2 end samTheme_p1CBTRun = 1 end

Actor.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:aux(1) if FUCK_EXE and samTheme_p1ComboBasedTorture then self:luaeffect('Update') end
end
Actor.UpdateCommand:
%function(self) if samTheme_p1CBTRun == 1 then samTheme_p1CBTRun = 0 samTheme_comboOffset = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):GetCurrentCombo() local old_dancepoints = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):GetPossibleDancePoints() local dancepoints = 5 * triangleNo(old_dancepoints/5) -- uhhhhhhhhh oops -- these include holds so i have to do holds stuff
STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):SetPossibleDancePoints(dancepoints) Trace('h') end end
Actor.OffCommand: %function(self) samTheme_p1CBTRun = nil -- clean your variables end
Actor.Fk_P1_W1MessageCommand: %function(self) if FUCK_EXE and samTheme_p1ComboBasedTorture and SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('ScoreP1') then local dancepoints = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):GetActualDancePoints() local combo = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):GetCurrentCombo() local modified_dancepoints = dancepoints + ((combo - samTheme_comboOffset - 1) * 5 ) STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):SetActualDancePoints(modified_dancepoints-5) -- erase regular fantastic points end end
